About SGC-Hosting

SGC-Hosting served as a "post-to-host" provider more than 8 years ago during its time as an online gaming community.  Today, SGC-Hosting provides custom web hosting and IT solutions for many businesses across Long Island as well as Shared, Reseller, and VPS hosting services.  We focus on providing reliable, professional solutions for our clients so they can run their website without worry.  We provide a 60-day money back guarantee on all of our hosting packages and a pro-rated cancellation policy.  Your price is guaranteed - in the event of price changes, you can either opt for the new, lower price or upgrade your features for the same price you're paying, your choice!

You we put a speedtest VPS on our latest node, so you can see the performance before purchasing.  Our speed test VPS uses 1 vCPU, 8GB of disk space, and 512MB of memory running CentOS 6.5 x64 (minimal install image) with nginx.

Speed tests are available here:

http://cali-speedtest.sgc-hosting.com/

And you can download a blank 100MB file here:

http://cali-speedtest.sgc-hosting.com/Test.dmg
